org.hps.detector.ecal

Class EcalCrystal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.detector.DetectorElement
      • org.hps.detector.ecal.EcalCrystal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, IDetectorElement

    public final class EcalCrystal
extends DetectorElement
    This class implements the geometry API for ECal crystals in the HPS experiment.

      • getPositionFront

        public Hep3Vector getPositionFront()
        Get the global center position of the XY plane in the front of the crystal. This is used in the reconstruction clustering algorithm for determining the "corrected" hit position, so it is best to cache it once used, for performance purposes.
        Returns:
        The center position of the XY plane in the front of the crystal.
